div.p: >> LOVED KILLING LINCOLN AND KILLING KENNEDY.
READ THEM BACK TO BACK. KEEP THEMPY THINK.
>>> JESSIE WENT OUT TO INTERVIEW THOSE WHO HAVE THE HIGH-TECH
WHEELCHAIRS DONATED BY YOU GUYS. I HOPE YOU ALL WATCH IT.
>>> THANK YOU TO THE USS MIDWAY MUSEUM WHO DONATED $35,000 TO
THE MEN AND WOMEN TO GET THE CHAIRS.
VETS HELPING VETS. "TIP OF THE DAY."
WATERS WORLD TOMORROW. THAT'S IT FOR US TONIGHT.
